page.title: 11The Life of a Policeman
page.content: {Law and Order}is the rules that govern our country and our D-block and people who don't obey these rules,{the {offenders,}are punished. A policeman is a member of a force and he is employed to keep "law and order". We interviewed a policeman to find out what life is like for him, helping to keep "law and order" in our D-block. To be a policeman you have to train for two years. He has been a policeman for 17 years. He wears a uniform like all other policeman so that they can be easily recognised. He is an ordinary beat policeman although at one time he worked as a{traffic {policeman.}He says,"It's a good job and I enjoy it. I like meeting people and I get a lot of satisfaction from the job."
